metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5360 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF before 4.0.6 mishandles the reading of TIFF files, as demonstrated by a heap-based buffer over-read in the ReadTIFFImage function in coders/tiff.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.27.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> dupe of CVE-2014-8127 and CVE-2016-3658 this will not be fixed in precise/esm

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
